attributes.title: I’m disgusted
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in at attempt to see what other plans the president had for us and for us and not only was the app terrible quality I actually didn’t agree ( for once)with all his dehumanizing tactics and racial offenses 😪 I’m truly so displeased

attributes.title: The program
attributes.review: So I was on this app, and all of a sudden it starts to glitch. I don’t know if it was hacks from the aliens, but really I didn’t like the app, it kept glitching for some reason. Totally not worth the time to get this app. Was a waste of time and download.

attributes.title: bad
attributes.review: Not sorry but I think this app should be taken down because it made a glitch on my phone. I had to restart my phone because of that I will never be downloading this ever again.

attributes.title: Dumb carrot
attributes.review: The app took about a week to download even on WiFi and I kept seeing this dumb carrot on there that doesn’t know how to behave as a president like seriously who tells people to put BLEACH in their system and he WILL have another empty trump rally but that all I gotta say

attributes.title: max howell
attributes.review: this app is absolutely awful. it took hours to download and as soon as it did, the screen kept on glitching out. it took a long time just for it to process the buttons i was tapping and i would give it 0 stars if i could. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. -gen z 😚✌️

attributes.title: Very Slow
attributes.review: Whenever I had put my mobile phone number to continue, it would reject it, it has been a full 24 hours and nothing has happened so I’m deleting this.

attributes.title: For trump not a FAN btw
attributes.review: A ugly man who lies to our contruy wants to delete tiktok you ugly idiot go to hell I wish you the worst in hell bye Trump and if you delete tiktok oh tiktok likes matter all 1m is going to hunt for you and kill you right away you hate black people you racist az president OBOMA Is better than your orange ugly self bye!!!!

attributes.title: Just really bad
attributes.review: The connection is horrible, the data it keeps on me has caused multiple issues through my family and I don’t trust what was once our great president. If I could give it zero stars I would >:(

attributes.title: Don’t get
attributes.review: This app makes my phone glitch so much I would try to open the app then it would close without me doing anything also it would make everything in it into one word

attributes.title: GEN Z IS THE BEST!!!!!
attributes.review:
Fan fiction 
It was a stormy gloomy night, pikachu and all the other Pokémon’s decided to take over the White House. They planned every day and night. They screamed “BUT KACCHAN WE WERE 5!!” They also made a song about Manny 👀 “THE MANNY WILL NOT BE TELEVISED!!!” they march into in the cold night rushing to the White House. There they spotted a orange 🍊 The orange said “STOP” but pikachu and his crew said “NOOOOOOOoooOooo!!” And screw him up. THE END:))) 
Anyways the app made my DOG DIED!!! XD
once I download the app he started to cough up?!??! He then passed away and ALSO THE APP SMELLS SOOOOO BAD 
ONE STAR😡✨ 
Bakugo is my husband 🙈💞
🏃‍♀️💨
